title: Fox, Indiana
text:
Fox is an <a href="unincorporated%20area">unincorporated community</a> in <a href="Pleasant%20Township%2C%20Grant%20County%2C%20Indiana">Pleasant Township</a>, <a href="Grant%20County%2C%20Indiana">Grant County</a>, <a href="Indiana">Indiana</a>.
History.
Fox was named for Edward Fox, a local settler. A post office was established at Fox in 1884, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1906.
Geography.
Fox is located at .
